Sentencas: One of the candidates for metallic interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells is a ferritic stainless steel, Crofer22 APU.
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects
Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: Crofer22 APU samples with different roughness were prepared by grinding with SiC grinding papers of various grits, and a polished Crofer22 APU sample was also prepared.
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: The prepared samples were then thermally cycled.
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: The variations of their oxidation behavior with surface roughness and the number of thermal cycles were investigated.
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: After 120 thermal cycles (a total 3000 h of exposure at 800 degrees C), the polished Crofer22 APU had a relatively flat, continuous Cr2O3 layer (thickness, similar to 1 mu m), while the Crofer22 APU ground with 80 grit showed an undulating, continuous Cr2O3 layer (thickness, similar to 2 mu m).
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: For the samples that were thermally cycled 4 times (at 800 degrees C for 100 h total), the area specific resistance (ASR) increased as grit number increased for all measured temperatures (600 -850 degrees C).
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: Generally, for the samples that were thermally cycled 20 times, the ASR decreased slowly as the grit number increased.
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects

Sentencas: For the samples thermally cycled 40 times, the ASR decreased in general at all the measuring temperatures as the number of grit increased, indicating that the polished Crofer22 APU is better than those with rougher surfaces for the application of Crofer22 APU to an interconnect of SOFC.
Titulo: Characterization of Oxidized Ferritic Stainless Steel with Undulated Surfaces for Metallic Interconnects
